targets.Name: Stool
Text:
Good Job!

 

See that the number on the top left side has lowered? That is the number that shows the number of triggers left. The goal is to reach 0 in each room.  

 

Now find the hat and click it to move on.

Good Work! Don't worry, You can get a new one

targets.Name: Hat
Text:
Fantastic! The last one is the carpet

Nice, You'll meed a hat but that's okay.

targets.Name: Carpet
Text: Great! You found the last one. Now that the you have found everything
Great! It's okay, I'll put it back later

Welcome to the Asthma Trigger House!

 

Before we enter the first room, we first will be explaining the mechanics of this house. There will be a number of triggers scattered throughout this house and for each, there are first finding the trigger and ways to avoid it as well.

 

(you would be able to see this at the top right of the screen) Lets start with the Stool.

Nice, you have now completed the first phase of "Finding the triggers", but now you'll be going through with phase 2.

 

In Phase 2, you would be locating the same items but this time, learn about "Ways to avoid these triggers". This way, we will take the items and put it in the treasure chest below.

 

Lets begin with the stool once agian.
targets.Name: Intro
